Further to your application asn the subsequent interviews that you had with us, we are pleased to offer you an appointment as ${object.job_id.name} in our organization under the following terms and conditions:

3. You will be initially posted to ${object.company_id.name},Sikirgaon,Gazaria,Munshigoanj but your service may be transferred to any department of factory of ${object.company_id.name} within the territory of Bangladesh. You will report to ${object.manager_id.name} on or before ${object.availability}

5. On principle as agreed you need serve in this organixation for a period of minimum 2.5 years.

This letter of appointment shall take effect and be valid only when a copy of this letter is signed by you before a withness and the same is returned to the under as an acknowledgement of your aceptance of the above terms and conditions.

We have pleasure in welcoming you to our organization and we sincerely hope that our close collaboration will be mutually beneficial to both of us.
